favourite.article: I really love this hymn because it opens up the view of all the spiritual blessings in the heavenlies in Christ in Ephesians 1:3-14. It shows how these blessings are all of the Triune Godâ€”the Father's choosing and predestinating, the Son's redeeming and the Spirit's sealing and pledging. All these spiritual and heavenly blessings are related to God's divine dispensing to make us God's sons for His eternal glory. What awesome blessings!
Lord we want to receive Your divine dispensing.
